about: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.
Project management system for Claude Code using GitHub Issues and Git worktrees for parallel agent execution.

A pure Unix shell script ACME client for SSL / TLS certificate automation
GitHub Copilot CLI brings the power of Copilot coding agent directly to your terminal.
Quickly create and run optimised Windows, macOS and Linux virtual machines
Autonomous AI development loop for Claude Code with intelligent exit detection

The ML4W Dotfiles for Hyprland - An advanced and full-featured configuration for the dynamic tiling window manager Hyprland. Ready to install with the Dotfiles Installer app with setup scripts for Arch Linux (Fedora and openSuse with limitations).
